    Tries to get an instance of the given class as a registered service of this node.

    Gets an array with all ServiceAgentImpls registered at this node.

    Gets an currently running agent executing the given service.
    ServiceAgentImpl NodeServiceCache.ServiceInstance.getServiceAgent()  
    ServiceAgentImpl Node.startService​(ServiceNameVersion nameVersion, java.lang.String passphrase)
    Starts a new instance of the given service on this node.
